```{r}
library(NLMR)
library(raster)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1000)
nr <- nlm_randomcluster(100, 100, p = 0.5)
weighting <- c(.5, .25, .25)
cr <- util_classify(nr, weighting)
util_plot(nr)
util_plot((cr + 1) * 20)
```

```{r}
x <- nlm_mpd(100, 100, roughness = .5) * 10
crs(x) <- "+proj=utm +zone=32 +north +ellps=WGS84 +datum=WGS84 +units=m"
slope.reclass <- matrix(c(0, 10, 1, 10, 20, 0.75, 20, 60, 0.25, 60, 90, 0),
                        ncol = 3, byrow = T)
terrain(x, opt = 'slope', unit = 'degrees') %>%
  reclassify(slope.reclass) %>% 
  plot
```
